# Ein Dev Components

Ein Dev components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [Ein Dev](https://ui.eindev.ir/).

## Components

- GlassRipple - [Source](https://ui.eindev.ir/docs/components/glass-ripple)
- StatsWidget - [Source](https://ui.eindev.ir/docs/components/stats-widget)
- StockWidget - [Source](https://ui.eindev.ir/docs/components/stock-widget)
- WeatherWidget - [Source](https://ui.eindev.ir/docs/components/weather-widget)
- GlassTimeline - [Source](https://ui.eindev.ir/docs/components/glass-timeline)
- CalendarWidget - [Source](https://ui.eindev.ir/docs/components/calendar-widget)
